New in and children's reading ideas

Subscribe to our monthly newsletter for reading, viewing and listening suggestions straight to your inbox.

Reviews, suggestions and lists of new books for children aged 0-11. We have recommendations for readers aged 11+ in our Young Adult section.

Celebrate Michael Bond's life and work with our selection of Paddington books and audiobooks

Written by Sophie Green · Published Jun 29, 2017

Michael Bond has died at the age of 91. Generations of children have loved his Paddington stories, so why not borrow some books or audiobooks to share with your child?

New children's books for July 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Jun 29, 2017

This month's bumper crop of new children's releases includes the new title from Halesworth librarian Francesca Armour-Chelu

Seven picture books to share with your children this Fathers' Day

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Jun 16, 2017

We've picked out some of our favourite children's books about dads for Fathers' Day

Borrow some of the best children's books of the last 80 years

Written by Alice Violett · Published Jun 15, 2017

A poll has revealed the UK's favourite children's books from the past 80 years. Why not pick up a story that has stood the test of time for your child?

Make your children laugh with the 2017 Lollies shortlist

Written by Alice Violett · Published Jun 6, 2017

The Laugh Out Loud Awards (Lollies) celebrate the funniest children's books.

New children's books for June 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published May 30, 2017

This month's children's books feature well-loved characters and encouragement to explore, challenge yourself and have fun

Recommended Reads for National Bookstart Week 2017 (5-11 June)

Written by Jo Dixon · Published May 16, 2017

This year, National Bookstart Week runs from 5-11 June and the theme is 'Let's Explore Outdoors'. Why not reserve some books from their outdoor-themed book list?

New children's books for May 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Apr 28, 2017

Old favourites and new characters abound in this month's new children's books

New children's books for April 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Mar 29, 2017

This month's titles feature all manner of animals and a couple of babies too

Check out children's books by authors from around the world for International Children's Book Day

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Mar 29, 2017

Sunday 2 April is International Children's Book Day. To mark the occasion, we've picked out some great books from foreign authors.
